remarks: An inner product times its conjugate.  (Contributed by NM, 23-Nov-2007.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
ipcl.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
ipcl.7 $e |- P = ( .iOLD ` U ) $.
ipipcj $p |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( ( A P B ) x. ( B P A ) ) = ( ( abs ` ( A P B ) ) ^ 2 ) ) $.
